title: Germs
description: Germs. So small and yet, they’re everywhere. Multiplying. Spreading. Humanity never expected its biggest threat would be… Germs!
quote: No, the germs are on me! The germs!
altHero: woman running through the street with big green germs all over her
alt1: child blowing out candles on a birthday cake
alt2: scientists aghast at what they see in the microscope
alt3: scientist kneeling in the street, germs are everywhere
alt4: a big green germ is consuming the Earth
